mapper.select: select sc.course_no as courseNo , sc.course_name as courseName from sys_course_student as scs join sys_course as sc on sc.course_no = scs.course_no where s_id = #{userId}

select sct.t_id as tId, sct.id as sId, sct.course_no as courseNo, sc.course_name as courseName, su.username from sys_course_teacher as sct join sys_course as sc on sc.course_no = sct.course_no join sys_user as su on su.no_number = sct.t_id

select scs.t_id as tId, scs.course_no as courseNo, sc.course_name as courseName, su.username from sys_course_student as scs join sys_course as sc on sc.course_no = scs.course_no join sys_user as su on su.no_number = scs.t_id where scs.s_id = #{uid}
